item.title: dotnet: Microsoft.Testing.Platform Now Fully Supported in Azure DevOps
item.description:
Azure DevOps now fully supports Microsoft.Testing.Platform, enabling teams to run tests and publish test results directly within Azure DevOps pipelines and workflows. The update improves integration between the testing platform and Azure DevOps for streamlined test execution and reporting.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Assign Azure Boards work items to Copilot coding agent in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced a public preview that lets you assign Azure Boards work items to the Copilot coding agent. The agent works asynchronously and autonomously in the background to implement tasks and open draft pull requests for your review.

  • Source: GitHub
